summary.value: Embrace the currents and seize your destiny!

system.description:
ALSO: Cutlass, Sailor, Seafarer

Born amidst the ebb and flow of tranquil waters, the Angler shares a bond with the aquatic realm. With rod in hand and a profound connection to the depths, they navigate treacherous seas, casting their fate upon the shimmering surface.

Masters of finesse and patience, they draw power from the mysterious creatures that dwell beneath, channeling the very essence of water itself.

ANGLER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

ANGLER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Nab6k6o0N5kJEVov]{Fishing (SL6)}

Fish out of nowhere and get benefits based on the fish caught. On a success, if you are able to equip the fish, you have the option to do a free attack with it, or trigger the effects of the fish if it is a Discovery, or store up to two fish in your inventory for later use. 

Alternatively, instead of fishing a new fish, you can equip up to two fish from your inventory and attack. If you are  holding two fishes or a fish and a weapon, you may choose to do two weapon fighting if applicable.

You may store up to 【SL】 fish in your inventory and you may fish up to 【SL】 times per scene.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.1fCaY2ogHQ9PMFJ1]{Improved Fishing}

Reduce your fishing die size by 1 (up to a minimum of d6) and Unique-rank bait will not be lost on a 7+.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.akFeDTKm7alzKanM]{Cast Net} (SL2)

You may spend 2 IP to create a thrown weapon known as a fishing net (see below). The fishing net will crumble to pieces as soon as it successfully hits an enemy. Upon creating a net, you perform a free attack with it. If this attack hits, choose one option: Reduce one enemy's next attack or offensive spell check by 【SL】, or improve one of your ally’s next attack or offensive spell check by 【SL】. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

WEAPON ACCURACY DAMAGE QUALITY
Fishing Net【DEX + INS】+ SL【HR + 4】 physicalTwo-handed ⬩ Melee ⬩ No Quality

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LIZqJawYLDxU7exx]{Reel It In!}

You may use your action to “reel in” an enemy, triggering an Opposed Check dependent on your narration. On a success, you may choose to do one out of the two options: If the enemy is in cover from someone using the Guard action, remove cover from that enemy. Or, steal 2 Inventory Points from the enemy.

Note that this would only make it so that the one who is guarded can be targeted again. The rest of the benefits of the Guard action will still apply.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MjH3YagE4nfW76yC]{There Once Was A Ship… (SL5)}

You are able to communicate with creatures of Aquatic origin.

While resting in an area, you can sing sea shanties with the group to gain a party wide effect that is able to be used once by each of your allies: Your next HP or MP cost is reduced by 【SL × 2】. If multiple characters have this Skill, the effects are not cumulative.

This can be stacked with camp activities.
